model.manager

Class PlanManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.manager.PlanManager

  • public class PlanManager
extends java.lang.Object
    PlanManager has the role to manage all the data related to the plan. It stores most of the mathematics results and it's a bridge between the controller and the model.
    Author:
    Vadim Caen, Maria Etegan, Anthony Faraut, Ludmila Danilescu, Marco Montalto, Bernardo Rittmeyer

    • Method Detail

      • loadPlanXML

        public void loadPlanXML(java.io.File fileXML)
                 throws java.lang.NullPointerException
        This method loads a "plan" from a xml file, passing through the XMLLoader class, and stores the result to the attributes troncons and vertexs. An exception is cached if there's a problem opening or reading the file.
        Parameters:
        fileXML - is a xml File, which contains all the informations concerning a plan.
        Throws:
        NullPointException() - if file is empty
        java.lang.NullPointerException

      • calculerPlusCourtChemin

        public Chemin calculerPlusCourtChemin(Noeud source,
                             Noeud cible)
        Cette methode calcule le plus court chemin entre 2 points avec la methode de Dijkstra
        Parameters:
        Noeud - source
        Noeud - target
        Vertex - source
        Vertex - target
        Returns:
        Chemin

      • getChemins

        public java.util.List<Chemin> getChemins(java.util.List<java.util.Set<Noeud>> plages)
        Fait le calcul du chemin optimal pour la livraison
        Parameters:
        Points - Une liste ordonnée de Sets des points de chaque plage horaire
        Returns:
        une liste des chemins à suivre pour la livraison
